Appraise.name: Appraise
Appraise.description: You can evaluate the monetary worth of an object.

Balance.name: Balance
Balance.description: You can keep your balance while traversing narrow or treacherous surfaces.

Bluff.name: Bluff
Bluff.description: You can make the outrageous or the untrue seem plausible.

Climb.name: Climb
Climb.description: You can scale vertical surfaces, from city walls to cliff faces.

Concentration.name: Concentration
Concentration.description: You can focus your mind, enabling you to cast a spell, use a spell-like ability, or use a skill despite distractions.

Craft.name: Craft
Craft.description: You are skilled in the creation of a specific group of items.

Decipher Script.name: Decipher Script
Decipher Script.description: You can understand writings in an unfamiliar language or a message written in an incomplete or archaic form.

Diplomacy.name: Diplomacy
Diplomacy.description: You can change the attitudes of others with a successful check.

Disable Device.name: Disable Device
Disable Device.description: You can jam locks, sabotage wagon wheels, disable traps, and perform similar acts of sabotage.

Escape Artist.name: Escape Artist
Escape Artist.description: You can slip bonds, squeeze through tight spaces, and generally contort yourself to escape from confinement.

Forgery.name: Forgery
Forgery.description: You can create false documents, identify such documents, and detect someone else's handiwork.

Gather Information.name: Gather Information
Gather Information.description: You can collect rumors, gossip, and lore from taverns, inns, and other social gathering places.

Handle Animal.name: Handle Animal
Handle Animal.description: You can handle an animal, train it to perform tricks, or even train it for a purpose such as combat or guarding.

Heal.name: Heal
Heal.description: You can tend to wounds and help others recover from various afflictions.

Hide.name: Hide
Hide.description: You can conceal yourself from enemies.

Intimidate.name: Intimidate
Intimidate.description: You can use this skill to get a bully to back down, frighten an enemy, or make a prisoner give you the information you want.

Jump.name: Jump
Jump.description: You can leap over pits, vault low fences, or reach a ledge.

Knowledge (arcana).name: Knowledge (arcana)
Knowledge (arcana).description: You have studied the arcane arts and know about magic-related topics.

Knowledge (architecture and engineering).name: Knowledge (architecture and engineering)
Knowledge (architecture and engineering).description: You know about buildings, aqueducts, bridges, fortifications, and other structures.

Knowledge (dungeoneering).name: Knowledge (dungeoneering)
Knowledge (dungeoneering).description: You know about aberrations, caverns, oozes, spelunking, and the Underdark.

Knowledge (geography).name: Knowledge (geography)
Knowledge (geography).description: You know about lands, terrain, climate, people, customs, kingdoms, and rulers.

Knowledge (history).name: Knowledge (history)
Knowledge (history).description: You know about wars, colonies, migrations, founding of cities, and other historical topics.

Knowledge (local).name: Knowledge (local)
Knowledge (local).description: You know about legends, personalities, inhabitants, laws, customs, traditions, and humanoids of a particular region.

Knowledge (nature).name: Knowledge (nature)
Knowledge (nature).description: You know about animals, fey, giants, monstrous humanoids, plants, seasons and cycles, weather, and vermin.

Knowledge (nobility and royalty).name: Knowledge (nobility and royalty)
Knowledge (nobility and royalty).description: You know about lineages, heraldry, family trees, mottoes, and personalities of the nobility.

Knowledge (religion).name: Knowledge (religion)
Knowledge (religion).description: You know about gods and goddesses, mythic history, ecclesiastic tradition, holy symbols, and undead.

Knowledge (the planes).name: Knowledge (the planes)
Knowledge (the planes).description: You know about the Inner Planes, Outer Planes, Astral Plane, Ethereal Plane, outsiders, elementals, and magic related to the planes.

Listen.name: Listen
Listen.description: You can hear approaching enemies, sneak up on foes, or overhear conversations.

Move Silently.name: Move Silently
Move Silently.description: You can sneak up on someone or slip away without being noticed.

Open Lock.name: Open Lock
Open Lock.description: You can pick padlocks, finesse combination locks, and solve puzzle boxes.

Perform.name: Perform
Perform.description: You can impress audiences with your talent and skill in a variety of performance types.

Profession.name: Profession
Profession.description: You are trained in a livelihood or a professional role.

Ride.name: Ride
Ride.description: You can ride a mount in combat or in noncombat situations.

Search.name: Search
Search.description: You can find secret doors, simple traps, hidden compartments, and other details not readily apparent.

Sense Motive.name: Sense Motive
Sense Motive.description: You can tell when someone is bluffing you, sense when someone is trustworthy, or determine if someone is under the influence of an enchantment.

Sleight of Hand.name: Sleight of Hand
Sleight of Hand.description: You can cut or lift purses, palm unattended objects, or perform feats of legerdemain.

Speak Language.name: Speak Language
Speak Language.description: You can speak and understand a language.

Spellcraft.name: Spellcraft
Spellcraft.description: You can identify spells and magic effects.

Spot.name: Spot
Spot.description: You can notice enemies, detect details, and see through disguises.

Survival.name: Survival
Survival.description: You can survive in the wild and navigate safely through dangerous territory.

Swim.name: Swim
Swim.description: You can swim and dive in various bodies of water.

Tumble.name: Tumble
Tumble.description: You can dive, roll, somersault, flip, and so on.

Use Magic Device.name: Use Magic Device
Use Magic Device.description: You can activate magic devices, even if you cannot normally do so.

Use Rope.name: Use Rope
Use Rope.description: You can tie knots, bind prisoners, and rig pulleys.
